title: MONDAY  - Week 15 recap 2020
itunes:title: MONDAY  - Week 15 recap 2020
description:
The Browns (0:09) post their first double-digit winning season for the first time in 13 years as they beat the Giants. The Seahawks clinch a playoff spot (0:52) with their win over Washington, and the Jets (1:19) finally get in the win column as they upset the Rams. Tom Brady does it again to the Falcons (1:45) with another come-from-behind victory. In the marquee matchup of the weekend, Patrick Mahomes (2:49) and the Chiefs hold off Drew Brees and company in his first game back from injury. Plus, we'll take a look at tonight's Monday night matchup (3:41) between the Steelers and Bengals

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
